name: Path of Insanity
description:
Hailing from the legendary Chair Studios, we present Path of Insanity.

1v1 Multiplayer Madness - Claim your victory against enemy castles through the Path of Insanity.

1vAI a selection of enemies with different powers and abilities to test your skills.

Frequent Updates - Fixes, New Features of absolute nonsense and rebalancing.

DLC - Community and Insanity inspired DLC's will be made available. New Weapons, Animations, Hilarious sounds and much more!

Ranked Multiplayer Leaderboards - Earn you rank as #1 as the Path of Insanity KING. Destroy all who oppose you with an awesome arsenal of insanity.

The Chair Studios Family - Join us on Discord for laughs and contribute to help us make the best experience you will ever have! https://discord.gg/HBjz2ayh
